overview:
Jordi is the Spainâ€™s CEO and has 13 years of experience working in advertising and marketing in various functions.

Over the last nine years he has held executive management positions at two major media agencies: MFT MANIFIESTO CONSULTING and STRIKE PRODUCTIONS (part of STRIKE Agency) where Jordi contributed to building a stronger focus on consumer receptivity to advertising messages to clients like Camel, J&B, KellogÂ´s, Lancomme Homme, LocaliaTV, Dodotis, Hughies, Allied Domeq, Beefeater IN.EDIT,

Jordi holds a Master in Strategic Direction of Marketing & Sales by ESIC Barcelona and a BBA from Universitat de Barcelona.

He is now living in his atelier in Barcelona close to MACBA where he leaves his great creativity grow-up.

Jordi has been invited by differents tv programs several times as Young Artist Revelation in 2009.
